briefTitle: A Prospective Study to Evaluate Continuous Positive Airway Pressure Devices to Reduce Pulmonary Dose
officialTitle: A Prospective Study to Evaluate Continuous Positive Airway Pressure Devices to Reduce Pulmonary Dose
conditions: Lung Cancer, Left Sided Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Dosimetry comparison CPAP and free breathing.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients with left-sided breast cancers

  * Patients must be undergoing left breast/chest wall radiation with or without regional nodal irradiation
* Patients undergoing lung SBRT

  * Primary lung cancers
  * Metastatic lung tumors

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients with right side breast cancer
* Patients who are unable to tolerate the CPAP device
